ENTRY.refkeywords: xskdblur2 kdblur2 load_kdblur2 blur laor2 x-spec xspec convolution model experimental
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: convolve with the laor2 model shape. XSpec convolution model *Experimental*.

DESC.PARA: A convolution model to smooth a spectrum by relatavistic effects from an accretion disk around a rotating black hole. The accretion disk has a broken-power law emissivity profile. Uses Ari Loar's calculation including GR effects (ApJ 376, 90). Modified from laor2 model by Andy Fabian and Roderick Johnstone.

ROW.DATA: Index: power law dependence of emissivity (scales as R^-Index)
radius atr which emissivity power-law index changes
Emissivity power-law index for radii > Rbreak

DESC.PARA: Please see ahelp xsconvolve for information on how to load the model.

LIST.CAPTION: Notes
LIST.ITEM: This is an experimental release of the convolution models; please take care when using this model.

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.10.0e of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.11.
The powerlaw and gaussian components are convolved by the kdblur2 model, with index set to 1.5 and the inner radius 10.
